user.name: Downton Abbey
user.description: The official home of #DowntonAbbey. The motion picture event returns in Downton Abbey: The Grand Finale, only in theaters September 12.

fullText:
The time has come to say goodbye.
 
Downton Abbey: The Grand Finale is only in theaters September 12.

Watch the new trailer now, and get your tickets to see the film early on September 10, exclusively in Dolby Cinema & Premium Large Formats in the US: https://t.co/8AnYwIfxur https://t.co/Awj8hFON5r
